plot: A French woman, who left Algeria at the end of the war of independence, tells about her political blindness and, then, her awakening.
title: Mère patrie
plot_es: A French woman, who left Algeria at the end of the war of independence, tells about her political blindness and, then, her awakening.
plot_en: A French woman, who left Algeria at the end of the war of independence, tells about her political blindness and, then, her awakening.
